metadata.description: Clinical Trial Data Quality Management System - RAG Knowledge Base

field_definitions.Subject: Unique patient/subject identifier within a study
field_definitions.Study: Clinical trial study identifier (e.g., Study 1, Study 21)
field_definitions.Country: Country code where the subject is enrolled
field_definitions.Site: Clinical site identifier where subject is being treated
field_definitions.SubjectStatus: Current enrollment status (Active, Discontinued, Screen Failure, etc.)
field_definitions.open_issues_count: Number of unresolved EDRR (Electronic Data Review Report) issues
field_definitions.safety_discrepancy_count: Number of safety data discrepancies requiring review
field_definitions.safety_reviews_pending: Number of safety reviews awaiting completion
field_definitions.meddra_total_events: Total adverse event records for MedDRA coding
field_definitions.meddra_coded_count: Number of adverse events with completed MedDRA coding
field_definitions.meddra_coding_pending: Number of adverse events awaiting MedDRA coding
field_definitions.whodd_total_events: Total medication records for WHODD coding
field_definitions.whodd_coded_count: Number of medications with completed WHODD coding
field_definitions.whodd_coding_pending: Number of medications awaiting WHODD coding
field_definitions.missing_pages_count: Number of missing CRF (Case Report Form) pages
field_definitions.missing_lab_count: Number of missing laboratory data records
field_definitions.total_issues: Aggregated count of all issue types
field_definitions.risk_category: Calculated risk level: Low, Medium, High, or Critical
field_definitions.has_pending_items: Binary flag indicating if subject has any pending items (1=Yes, 0=No)
field_definitions.risk_probability: Confidence score of the risk prediction (0-100%)
field_definitions.predicted_issues: ML model predicted total issues count

cra_terminology.CRA: Clinical Research Associate - responsible for monitoring site compliance
cra_terminology.CRF: Case Report Form - document used to collect patient data
cra_terminology.EDRR: Electronic Data Review Report - system for tracking data issues
cra_terminology.MedDRA: Medical Dictionary for Regulatory Activities - standardized adverse event coding
cra_terminology.WHODD: WHO Drug Dictionary - standardized medication coding
cra_terminology.SAE: Serious Adverse Event - safety event requiring expedited reporting

query_examples: What is the risk status of subject X?
Show me all critical risk subjects in Study 1
Generate a CRA report for Study 21
Which sites have the most issues?
What are the pending items for subject X?
How many safety discrepancies are there in Study 5?
List all subjects with missing lab data
What is the data quality index for site Y?
Show me subjects with outstanding visits
Which studies have the highest pending item rates?
